object.name: hyprpaper_core_manager
object.description: This is the core manager object for hyprpaper operations

s2c.name: add_monitor
s2c.description: Emitted when a new monitor is added.

s2c.name: remove_monitor
s2c.description: Emitted when a monitor is removed.

c2s.name: destroy
c2s.description: Destroys this object. Children remain alive until destroyed.

value.name: inert_wallpaper_object
value.description: attempted to use an inert wallpaper object

object.name: hyprpaper_wallpaper
object.description: This is an object describing a wallpaper

c2s.name: path
c2s.description: Set a file path for the wallpaper. This has to be an absolute path from the fs root. This is required.

c2s.name: fit_mode
c2s.description: Set a fit mode for the wallpaper. This is set to cover by default.

c2s.name: monitor_name
c2s.description:
Set a monitor for the wallpaper. Setting this to empty (or not setting at all) will treat this as a wildcard fallback.
See hyprpaper_core_manager.add_monitor and hyprpaper_core_manager.remove_monitor for tracking monitor names.

c2s.name: apply
c2s.description:
Applies this object's state to the wallpaper state. Will emit .success on success, and .failed on failure.
This object becomes inert after .succeess or .failed, the only valid operation is to destroy it afterwards.

s2c.name: failed
s2c.description: Wallpaper was not applied. See the error field for more information.
